trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Middletown
There were no other sightings in Middletown on or around May 20th 1997
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a very clear night.able to see all the stars with not one cloud..Im on my way home,walkin..and somethin told me to jus look up and when i did,i saw what i thought was an airplane.Mind you,this was night time,pretty dark out.when i looked at it,i saw that it was goin pretty slow..the weirdest thing about this craft was that it had 2 huge lights,next to eachother.id say one on each wing..but still closer together..they literally looked like eyeballs..it had pupils lookin left to right and then the eyes were blinkin.And im jus like..umm..lol,i aint kno wat to think of it..the rest of the object was black,silouete like..triangular shaped,jus the corners were rounded off...they were jus staring at me,and i got really freaked out like what the hell are you lookin at!..the color of the eyes were green,and the pupils were black..it was flying directly above me..and id have to say that it was about..a few thousand feet in the air..being that i was 9 years old,that most definately freaked me the hell out..then i jus walked into my house and thought to myself that maybe it was for some type of an event or somethin..plus the eyes..looked digital..idk that whole thing was weird kuz i always see airplanes and helicopters and they are very noisy..this was completely silent..interesting to me..
Summary: trianglular craft,rounded off at the corners
